What are the treatments for Mineral and Bone Disorder in Chronic Kidney Disease ?,"Treating mineral and bone disorder in CKD includes preventing damage to bones by controlling parathyroid hormone levels through changes in eating, diet, and nutrition; medications and supplements; and dialysis.
